channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 22:19 Alarm lifted in Kyiv. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 22:19 Alarm lifted in Kyiv. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_city This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 22:01 The threat of artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community has been eliminated. Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
